casebody.data:
Richmond

KENNETH WAYNE JACKSON v. COMMONWEALTH OF VIRGINIA No. 1467-86-2 Decided October 2, 1989

UPON REHEARING EN BANC

PER CURIAM.

Upon a rehearing en banc, the judgment of the circuit court is reversed for the reasons stated by the majority in a panel of this Court in Jackson v. Commonwealth, 8 Va. App. 176, 380 S.E.2d 1 (1989).

Koontz, C.J., Barrow, J., Benton, J., Coleman, J., Duff, J., Hodges, J., Keenan, J., Moon, J., and Cole, J., concurred.
